extras.name: Batman Return of the Caped Crusaders
extras.overview: Adam West and Burt Ward returns to their iconic roles of Batman and Robin. The film sees the superheroes going up against classic villains like The Joker, The Riddler, The Penguin and Catwoman, both in Gotham City… and in space.

extras.name: Beauty and the Beast
extras.overview: A live-action adaptation of Disney's version of the classic tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.

extras.name: Blade Runner 2049
extras.overview: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

extras.name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
extras.overview: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

extras.name: Batman vs. Robin
extras.overview: Damian Wayne is having a hard time coping with his father's "no killing" rule. Meanwhile, Gotham is going through hell with threats such as the insane Dollmaker, and the secretive Court of Owls.

extras.name: Batman Year One
extras.overview: Two men come to Gotham City: Bruce Wayne after years abroad feeding his lifelong obsession for justice and Jim Gordon after being too honest a cop with the wrong people elsewhere. After learning painful lessons about the city's corruption on its streets and police department respectively, this pair learn how to fight back their own way. With that, Gotham's evildoers from top to bottom are terrorized by the mysterious Batman and the equally heroic Gordon is assigned to catch him by comrades who both hate and fear him themselves. In the ensuing manhunt, both find much in common as the seeds of an unexpected friendship are laid with additional friends and rivals helping to start the legend.

extras.name: Big Trouble in Little China
extras.overview: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

extras.name: Blazing Saddles
extras.overview: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

extras.name: Batman vs. Two-Face
extras.overview: Former Gotham City District Attorney Harvey Dent, one side of his face scarred by acid, goes on a crime spree based on the number '2'. All of his actions are decided by the flip of a defaced, two-headed silver dollar.

extras.name: Beauty and the Beast
extras.overview: Follow the adventures of Belle, a bright young woman who finds herself in the castle of a prince who's been turned into a mysterious beast. With the help of the castle's enchanted staff, Belle soon learns the most important lesson of all -- that true beauty comes from within.

extras.name: Blade Runner
extras.overview: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

extras.name: Bedazzled
extras.overview: Stanley is infatuated with Margaret, the statuesque waitress who works with him. He meets George Spiggott AKA the devil and sells his soul for 7 wishes, which Stanley uses to try and make Margaret his own first as an intellectual, then as a rock star, then as a wealthy industrialist. As each fails, he becomes more aware of how empty his life had been and how much more he has to live for.

extras.name: Ben-Hur
extras.overview: Judah Ben-Hur, a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

extras.name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
extras.overview: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

extras.name: Batman v Superman Dawn of Justice
extras.overview: Fearing the actions of a god-like Super Hero left unchecked, Gotham City’s own formidable, forceful vigilante takes on Metropolis’s most revered, modern-day savior, while the world wrestles with what sort of hero it really needs. And with Batman and Superman at war with one another, a new threat quickly arises, putting mankind in greater danger than it’s ever known before.

extras.name: Blade Trinity
extras.overview: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

extras.name: Blade
extras.overview: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

extras.name: Blade II
extras.overview: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

extras.name: Beetlejuice
extras.overview: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

extras.name: Ben-Hur
extras.overview: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

extras.name: Batman The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
extras.overview: Batman has stopped the reign of terror that The Mutants had cast upon his city.  Now an old foe wants a reunion and the government wants The Man of Steel to put a stop to Batman.

extras.name: Batman vs Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
extras.overview: Batman, Batgirl and Robin forge an alliance with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles to fight against the Turtles' sworn enemy, The Shredder, who has apparently teamed up with Ra's Al Ghul and The League of Assassins.

extras.name: Being John Malkovich
extras.overview: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

extras.name: Batman Under the Red Hood
extras.overview: Batman faces his ultimate challenge as the mysterious Red Hood takes Gotham City by firestorm. One part vigilante, one part criminal kingpin, Red Hood begins cleaning up Gotham with the efficiency of Batman, but without following the same ethical code.

extras.name: Big Hero 6
extras.overview: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

extras.name: Bayonetta Bloody Fate
extras.overview: Bayonetta: Bloody Fate follows the story of the witch Bayonetta, as she defeats the blood-thirsty Angels and tries to remember her past from before the time she awoke, 20 years ago. Along her side are a mysterious little girl who keeps calling her "Mummy", a journalist that holds a personal grudge against Bayonetta and a unknown white-haired woman who seems to know more than she is willing to reveal about Bayonetta's time before her sleep.

extras.name: Bedazzled
extras.overview: Elliot Richardson, a suicidal techno geek, is given seven wishes to turn his life around when he meets a very seductive Satan. The catch: his soul. Some of his wishes include a 7 foot basketball star, a rock star, and a hamburger. But, as could be expected, the Devil puts her own little twist on each of his fantasies.
